entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Stirling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:36 a.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low 10.
entry.summary: Rain ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning. Rain at times heavy beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
